oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Death card or notice of Rufus B. Parkes (Parks)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Memorial or death notice card of Lt. Rufus B. Parkes (Parks), Co. E, 9th KY, Inf. Regt., CSA. "To the Memory of Rufus B. Parks," who died September 22, 1897, aged 75 years. Parkes lost his diary at Shiloh and it was returned to his family in 1925. Co. E was composed of men from Middle Tenn. and was attached to the 9th Ky. Inf. Regt., CSA, in order to complete the regimental structure. After Shiloh they became Co. A, 23rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Parkes was discharged from the service in May 1862.
